name: freedombox
tagline: A personal server system for running privacy-focused services at home
description: FreedomBox is a personal server operating system that makes hosting your own apps like VPN, file sharing, chat, and more easy via a web UI. Designed for ease of use and privacy using Debian as the base system.

features.title: Personal Server Platform
features.description: Host personal and community services on a small server

features.title: Service Management
features.description: Enable and configure multiple network services from a web UI

features.title: Privacy-Focused Services
features.description: Run communication and collaboration services for personal use

features.title: System Administration
features.description: Manage users, updates, and system settings

features.title: Web-Based Interface
features.description: Administer services using a browser interface

features.title: Hardware Flexibility
features.description: Deploy on single-board computers and standard servers
